Package java_gui

Class managerSql

  • java.lang.Object
    • java_gui.managerSql
  • public class managerSql
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds SQL queries and date parameters for managing reports and inventory in a store management system.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      (package private) java.lang.String CombinedInventoryUsage
      SQL query section that combines the usage of ingredients, serving containers, and utensils into a single dataset for inventory usage reporting.
      (package private) java.time.LocalDateTime endDate
      The end date for the time window of the queries.
      (package private) java.lang.String IngredientInventoryUsage
      SQL query section that calculates the total quantity of ingredients used based on the products ordered within the specified time window.
      (package private) java.lang.String productUsageQuery
      SQL query to calculate the total usage of ingredients for products within a specified date range.
      (package private) java.lang.String restockQuery
      SQL query to identify inventory items that need to be restocked.
      (package private) java.lang.String salesReportQuery
      SQL query to generate a sales report summarizing the total quantity sold and the total sales amount for each product type within a specified date range.
      (package private) java.lang.String ServingContainerUsage
      SQL query section that calculates the total quantity of serving containers used (e.g., bowls, plates, family feasts) based on the product type.
      (package private) java.time.LocalDateTime startDate
      The start date for the time window of the queries.
      (package private) java.lang.String UtensilUsage
      SQL query section that calculates the total number of utensils used based on the products ordered within the specified time window.
      (package private) java.lang.String xReportQuery
      SQL query to generate an hourly report (X Report) showing the total sales amount and the number of orders for each hour of the current day.
      (package private) java.lang.String zReportQuery
      SQL query to generate a daily report (Z Report) summarizing the total number of orders, total items sold, and total sales amount for the current day.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      managerSql()  

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • startDate

        java.time.LocalDateTime startDate
        The start date for the time window of the queries. Set to January 1, 2024, 12:00 AM.

      • endDate

        java.time.LocalDateTime endDate
        The end date for the time window of the queries. Set to December 31, 2024, 11:59 PM.

      • productUsageQuery

        java.lang.String productUsageQuery
        SQL query to calculate the total usage of ingredients for products within a specified date range. It aggregates the usage of inventory items based on the products ordered.

      • salesReportQuery

        java.lang.String salesReportQuery
        SQL query to generate a sales report summarizing the total quantity sold and the total sales amount for each product type within a specified date range.

      • xReportQuery

        java.lang.String xReportQuery
        SQL query to generate an hourly report (X Report) showing the total sales amount and the number of orders for each hour of the current day.

      • zReportQuery

        java.lang.String zReportQuery
        SQL query to generate a daily report (Z Report) summarizing the total number of orders, total items sold, and total sales amount for the current day.

      • restockQuery

        java.lang.String restockQuery
        SQL query to identify inventory items that need to be restocked. It selects items from the inventory that have a quantity less than 40 units.

      • IngredientInventoryUsage

        java.lang.String IngredientInventoryUsage
        SQL query section that calculates the total quantity of ingredients used based on the products ordered within the specified time window. It aggregates the total ingredient usage from product breakdowns.

      • ServingContainerUsage

        java.lang.String ServingContainerUsage
        SQL query section that calculates the total quantity of serving containers used (e.g., bowls, plates, family feasts) based on the product type. Associates specific container IDs with the product type and aggregates their usage.

      • UtensilUsage

        java.lang.String UtensilUsage
        SQL query section that calculates the total number of utensils used based on the products ordered within the specified time window. It assigns a fixed utensil ID and sums up the usage.

      • CombinedInventoryUsage

        java.lang.String CombinedInventoryUsage
        SQL query section that combines the usage of ingredients, serving containers, and utensils into a single dataset for inventory usage reporting. It merges the results of `IngredientInventoryUsage`, `ServingContainerUsage`, and `UtensilUsage` queries.

    • Constructor Detail

      • managerSql

        public managerSql()
